name: FindResource
description: Find an Azure resource given its type and tags
author: louisgerard
helpMarkDown: Find an Azure resource given its type and tags

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Resource Manager subscription

inputs.name: ResourceType
inputs.label: Resource Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the type of Azure resource

inputs.name: Tags
inputs.label: Tags
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the tags in Json format. eg. { "environment" : "prod", "version" : "2" }

inputs.name: ResourceNameVar
inputs.label: Resource Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will contain the name of the resource if found.

inputs.name: ResourceIdVar
inputs.label: Resource Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will contain the Azure Id of the resource if found.

inputs.name: ResourceGroupNameVar
inputs.label: Resource Group Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will contain the resource group name of the resource if found.

inputs.name: ResourceLocationVar
inputs.label: Resource Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will contain the location of the resource if found. (eg. northeurope)

inputs.name: KeyVaultUriVar
inputs.label: KeyVault Uri
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will contain the uri of the Key Vault if found. (eg. https://mykeyvault.vault.azure.net/)

inputs.name: AppServiceHostNameVar
inputs.label: App Service Host Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will contain the first host name of the App Service if found. (eg. myappservice.azurewebsites.net)

inputs.name: FqdnVar
inputs.label: Fully Qualified Domain Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will contain the fully qualified name of the Sql Server if found. (eg. myserver.database.windows.net)

inputs.name: AdministratorLoginVar
inputs.label: Administrator Login
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will contain the administrator login of the Sql Server if found.

inputs.name: SkuNameVar
inputs.label: Sku Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will contain the Sku name of the App Service Plan if found. (eg. S2)

inputs.name: SkuCapacityVar
inputs.label: Sku Capacity
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will contain the capacity of the App Service Plan if found. (eg. 2)

inputs.name: AppInsightsKeyVar
inputs.label: InstrumentationKey
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will contain the instrumentation key of the AppInsights if found.

inputs.name: StoragePrimaryKeyVar
inputs.label: Primary Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will contain the primary key of the Storage Account if found.

inputs.name: StorageSecondaryKeyVar
inputs.label: Secondary Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will contain the secondary key of the Storage Account if found.

inputs.name: SqlDbServerNameVar
inputs.label: Sql Server Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will contain the name of the Sql Server hosting the database if found.

inputs.name: SqlDbServiceLevelObjectiveVar
inputs.label: Sql Database Service Level Objective
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will contain the service level objective of the database if found. (eg. Basic, S0)

inputs.name: SqlDbEditionVar
inputs.label: Sql Database Edition
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will contain the edition of the database if found. (eg. Basic, Standard)
